channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- Openshift Container Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- Openshift Container Platform

item.title: CVE-2018-10937|2024-08-05T07:54:36.023Z -- red%20hat -- openshift%20container%20platform
item.description: A cross site scripting flaw exists in the tetonic-console component of Openshift Container Platform 3.11. An attacker with the ability to create pods can use this flaw to perform actions on the K8s API as the victim.
